Title: Provides that no person convicted of certain felonies may file for change of name while incarcerated or under supervised release therefor
Summary: Provides that no person convicted of certain felonies defined under specified laws of this state may file a petition for change of name while such person is incarcerated or under supervised release therefor.
LawCode: Amd ยง60, Civ Rts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil rights law, in relation to prohibiting certain felons from changing their names
